item.title:
Txs for buying trump and his wife simply does not land with most RPCs. Not sure why we share a free swQoS endpoint with hardware sigverify can get so much hate 😅😅
And sorry, our validator and endpoint landed thousands of trump and melina trades with no priority fee last hour.

item.title:
RT by @shoucccc: Solayer 中文频道上线一周啦！在宣布推出Infinite SVM，硬件加速解决方案及社区销售后，我们得到了非常多的支持，也收到了非常多的问题。
上好闹钟，1月16日晚上10:00PM HKT 加入我们的首次中文 AMA!
主持人： @ynonestop 分享嘉宾：Solayer 核心创始成员 @ChazChazC , @shoucccc
让我们加速 ♾️
item.dc:creator: @Solayer_CN

item.title:
RT by @shoucccc: “True partnerships thrive not only on shared goals but on a mutual belief in shaping a better future together.”
Two years ago, at the annual SBC conference, I had the chance to meet @shoucccc and @liujeff by chance.
Chaofan is, without a doubt, one of the most fascinating developers I’ve ever met—sharp, insightful, and always ready to share his opinions. Without hesitation, we @verilog_audit invested in Fuzzland, joining their team in pushing the boundaries of security innovation.
Congratulations to Chaofan and the @fuzzland_ team on completing the merge deal! Wishing you all the best in your collaboration with @solayer_labs, and I’m looking forward to seeing how this partnership brings us an even better user experience!
For me, the true meaning of investing isn’t about returns or valuations—it’s about the opportunity to walk alongside founders who are full of energy, capability, and vision. It’s about sharing their struggles, pain, and growth along the way. I’m incredibly grateful to have been part of this journey.
item.dc:creator: @mr_dddt
item.description:
“True partnerships thrive not only on shared goals but on a mutual belief in shaping a better future together.”

Two years ago, at the annual SBC conference, I had the chance to meet @shoucccc and @liujeff by chance.

Chaofan is, without a doubt, one of the most fascinating developers I’ve ever met—sharp, insightful, and always ready to share his opinions. Without hesitation, we @verilog_audit invested in Fuzzland, joining their team in pushing the boundaries of security innovation.

Congratulations to Chaofan and the @fuzzland_ team on completing the merge deal! Wishing you all the best in your collaboration with @solayer_labs, and I’m looking forward to seeing how this partnership brings us an even better user experience!

For me, the true meaning of investing isn’t about returns or valuations—it’s about the opportunity to walk alongside founders who are full of energy, capability, and vision. It’s about sharing their struggles, pain, and growth along the way. I’m incredibly grateful to have been part of this journey.

nitter.freedit.eu/shoucccc/status/1876362208311210327#m

item.title:
RT by @shoucccc: I guess folks are not happy with “16B+ TPS” claim. Here are some clarifications - it’s used to show throughput.
16B+ *non-conflicting* transactions with correct pre-execution is around 700GB in our implementation and can be easily handled by sequencer in one second. Sequencer just needs to apply the effects via RDMA.
For conflicting transactions, TPS is much lower than that.
item.dc:creator: @shoucccc
item.description:
I guess folks are not happy with “16B+ TPS” claim. Here are some clarifications - it’s used to show throughput.

16B+ *non-conflicting* transactions with correct pre-execution is around 700GB in our implementation and can be easily handled by sequencer in one second. Sequencer just needs to apply the effects via RDMA.

For conflicting transactions, TPS is much lower than that.
